{{Advert|date=October 2011}} {{Infobox software | name = Ashampoo Burning Studio | logo = <!-- Please, insert Ashampoo Burning Studio 9 logo if you have it. --> | screenshot = [[Image:Ashampoo Burning Studio.png|250px]] | caption = Showing Ashampoo Burning Studio 9 main interface | author = | developer = [[Ashampoo]] | released = 1999 | latest release version = 10.0.10 | latest release date = {{Start date and age|2011|05|05}} | latest preview version = | latest preview date = | programming language = | operating system = [[Microsoft Windows|Windows 2000, XP, Vista, 7]] | language = Multilingual (32) | status = Current | genre = [[Optical disc authoring software]] | license = [[Commercial software|Commercial]] [[proprietary software|proprietary]], [[Shareware]], [[Freeware]] (only version 6) | website = [http://www.ashampoo.com/en/usd/pin/2610/Burning_Software/Ashampoo-Burning-Studio-10 Ashampoo Burning Studio website] }} '''Ashampoo Burning Studio''' is an [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] for [[Microsoft Windows]], developed by [[Ashampoo]]. It is one of the most-used alternatives to [[Nero Burning ROM]] on Windows, but not as popular as the latter<ref>[http://download.cnet.com/windows/cd-burners/?tag=mncol%3Bsort&sort=downloadCount+asc CNET Download.com Windows "CD Burners" Total Downloads]</ref>.
Its main advantages are that it is simple, lightweight, and very easy to use.<ref>[http://news.softpedia.com/news/CDRWIN-vs-Ashampoo-Burning-Studio-38925.shtml CDRWIN vs. Ashampoo Burning Studio - Burn or get burnt! - Softpedia<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> However, that is also one of its weaknesses: it does not contain many extras that power users might find useful.
It is capable of creating compilations of [[Compact disc|CDs]], [[Disk Image|Optical Disc Images]], [[DVD]]s and [[Blu-ray Disc]]s.
It also allows the creation of DVD movies from video files.
As a way to promote their brand and software, Ashampoo has released Ashampoo Burning Studio 6 as free software.<ref>[http://www.download.com/Ashampoo-Burning-Studio-Free/3000-2646_4-10776287.html]</ref>
Ashampoo Burning Studio 2010 Advanced is a stripped down free version of Ashampoo Burning Studio 9.24 which is available through third party websites.<ref>[http://store.v3.co.uk/p9387-ashampoo_burning_studio_2010_advanced]</ref>
